channel.title: Recruiting 2 graphic designers
channel.description:
Hey, im looking for at least 2 graphic designers for my project(is really serious one) Realms of Agony. It's going to be like no other, if you need more info just pm me your skype for a further discussion. The only thing that i've posted about it on rune-server is this.
Note: You will have to show some previous work.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/wrc2ld.gif[/img]
